Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 03 Jun 2019You can try downloading the TransitLink SimplyGo app to keep track of your expenses on public transport. It allows you to view and track your transaction records, up to the last 180 days! It shows the fare paid for every trip. Alternatively, you can also use the Seedly app, but you won't be able to keep track of every single trip. It shows as a lump sum, either every 5 days or when total fares exceed $15.0 comments2
